description: Parent tab container that holds child views as individual tabs. Each child view can use a different renderer. Creates a tabbed navigation experience for multi-dimensional analysis results. Children are auto-included when the parent is selected.
ideal_for: complex results requiring separate renderer per aspect
combining timeline, card, and prose views in one container
instantiation_hints: 1. Create the parent view with renderer_type='tab' and minimal config. 2. Create child views with parent_view_key pointing to this view. 3. Each child can use any renderer_type independently. 4. Set child positions for tab ordering. 5. Children are auto-included by the compose endpoint â€” don't add them to plan recommendations separately.
